Internship at Microsoft Research.

There is an opening for a three month internship for a PhD student at Microsoft Research, Cambridge, beginning April 2014. The internship will consist of a design-oriented ethnography of high-rise and high-density urban living, with a focus on the technologies used in this kind of communal living. See here for more information.
